name: Aleapi
description:
Because of the personal stuff, I wouldn't be able to use the whole weekend (72 hrs). Still, I've liked the theme/limitation combo so much that I decided to give it a try by making a small prototype under 24 hrs. There is no win condition or anything like that. Maybe I will continue this little project, who knows.

Made for Mini-Jam 95 in 72  24 hours with the theme of Chance and limitation of No-RNG

nothing in the game uses a random generator. Everything  (Audio, VFX, Feel) is tied to the pi counter on the bottom of the screen
